entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland.
